name: Doctor Robotnik's Creature Capture
summary: This is a hack which changes Sonic the Hedgehog for Genesis into a entirely different game with new gameplay. It stars Dr. Robotnik whom must capture creatures with a net and put them in creature capsules. The graphics are the same as previous Sonic games but the rest is mostly changed. Most levels are open by default.

videos.title: Dr. Robotnik's Creature Capture: A Spin-off Sonic Hack
